sys_update_xml.payload: c$pe-timeline-items-color: #ff6f00 !default; .expanded { .panel-proper { box-shadow: 0 2px 4px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15); } .panel-drawer { transform: translateY(0); } .panel-drawer-wrapper { max-height: 1000px; } } .panel-wrapper { margin-bottom: 10px; } .panel-wrapper.expanded-wrapper { height: 900px; } .panel-proper { background-color: #fff; border-radius: 5px; transition: box-shadow 0.5s; } .panel-header { position: relative; padding: 7px 12px; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 600; border-bottom: 0.5px solid #7E848B; } .counter { display: inline-block; background-color: #7e848b; width: 22px; height: 22px; fill: #fff; color: #fff; text-align: center; border-radius: 11px; margin: 0 2px; font-weight: 400; &:first-child { margin-left: -5px; } } .timeline-icon { display: inline-block; background-color: #7e848b; width: 1.6em; height: 1.6em; text-align: center; border-radius: 11px; position: absolute; top: 0px; left: -6.5px; &:first-child { margin-left: -5px; } } .tl-icon { color: #fff; position: absolute; top: 0px; left: -5px; text-align: center; } .panel-content { padding: 12px; } .stat-text { font-size: 36px; font-weight: 200; vertical-align: middle; &.key-smaller { font-size: 24px; height: 24px; } &.key-bigger { font-size: 44px; height: 44px; } } .left-description { font-size: 14px; opacity: 0.7; display: inline-block; width: 40px; vertical-align: top; } .tl-item { font-size: 14px; opacity: 0.7; } .left-description { display: inline-block; width: 40px; vertical-align: top; } .tl-item.not-faded { opacity: 1; } .tl-item.tl-item-summary { opacity: 1; .tl-icon { color: #fff; } } .tl-item:last-child { opacity: 1; .right-content { border-left-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); } } .right-content { margin-left: 10px; position: relative; display: inline-block; width: 265px; border-left: 1px solid #485563; padding: 0 5px 5px 20px; } .right-content>* { margin-bottom: 8px; } .right-content-title { margin-left: 3px; } .key-value { color: $pe-timeline-items-color; fill: $pe-timeline-items-color; height: 26px; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1; } .icon-inline { vertical-align: middle; } .text-inline { vertical-align: middle; } .subtitle { font-size: 15px; padding-top: 4px; } .expander-button-wrapper { text-align: center; margin: 10px 0; } .expander-button { display: inline-block; padding: 3px 10px; border-right: 1px solid #7e848b;
